clothes.title: Clothing
clothes.description:
The blanks are made entirely of cotton and are verified by "Fair Wair", "GRS", "GOTS". Printed were
the shirts in the district of Biberach, so everything local!
clothes.subject: T-Shirt Order
clothes.body:
Hello Matze you horny sow,

I would like to order one of these awesome t-shirts.

Is there still one in size {{selectedSize}}?

Best regards
